content: Embedding {{productName}} or its part using JavaScript. Copy the JavaScript code below.

comment.text: This translation key is used for describing JavaScript code related to embedding a product using JavaScript. It appears on a page providing code to insert into the UI, and its purpose is to guide users on how to use it correctly.

usage.context:
<CodeWrapper height="fit-content">
 <CategorySubHeader className="copy-window-code">
 {`JavaScript ${t("CodeTitle")}`}
 </CategorySubHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" className="preview-description">
 {t("JavaScriptCodeDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 </Text>
 <CodeBlock config={config} scriptUrl={scriptUrl} theme={theme} />
 </CodeWrapper>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'yerləşdirilməsi' is a slightly awkward translation of 'embedding'. A more natural phrasing would be 'JavaScript vasitəsilə {{productName}}-i və ya onun bir hissəsini inteqrasiya etmək' or 'JavaScript vasitəsilə {{productName}}-i və ya onun bir hissəsini daxil etmək'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript vasitəsilə {{productName}}-i və ya onun bir hissəsini inteqrasiya etmək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Aşağıdakı' is slightly formal. A more conversational tone might be preferable.
The word 'JavaScriptiä' is not the correct Finnish form. It should be 'JavaScriptia'.
The phrase "JavaScript-ի միջոցով" is grammatically awkward. While technically correct, it's less natural in Armenian. A more fluent phrasing would be preferred.
The colon after "JavaScript-ի միջոցով" feels slightly disjointed. It might be better to rephrase to avoid it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript-ի օգտագործման միջոցով։ Պատճենեք JavaScript կոդը ստորև:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຖ່າຍບົດລະຫັດ JavaScript ດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້" sounds a bit awkward. 'ຖ່າຍ' implies copying like a photo. A better phrasing would suggest to 'copy' or 'use' the code.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ບົດລະຫັດ JavaScript ດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "spațiului" (of the space) seems awkward and doesn't quite capture the meaning of "Embedding." A more natural translation would focus on the action of embedding rather than the space itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrarea {{productName}} sau a unei părți din acesta cu ajutorul JavaScript.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කොටසක්' (kotasak) is technically correct but sounds somewhat awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing might be 'කොටසැක' (kotasak) or 'අංගයක්' (angayak).
While technically correct, the phrasing 'පහත ජාවාස්ක්‍රිප්ට් කෝඩ්ප්‍රමාණය පිටපත් කරන්න' is a bit long.  It could be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewording to 'පහත ජාවාස්ක්‍රිප්ට් කේත පිටපත් කරන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'помоц́у' is spelled incorrectly. It should be 'помоћу'.
The use of "pomoću" is grammatically correct, but "uz pomoć" might be slightly more common and flow better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ugrađivanje {{productName}}-a ili njegovog dela uz pomoć JavaScript. Kopirajte JavaScript kod ispod.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'представлений' (presented) doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'below' in this context. It sounds more formal than intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вбудовування простору {{productName}} або його частини за допомогою JavaScript. Скопіюйте код JavaScript, наведений нижче.
